sections.heading: Title.Section 813.2 - Provisions relating to hearing and trial in indictable cases
sections.text:
813.1 Title.

These rules shall be known as the rules of criminal procedure. (R.Cr.P.)[76 Acts, ch 1245(2), §1301, Rule 31; 77 Acts, ch 153, §106; C79, 81, §813.1] Sat Dec 23 12:34:49 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 813.1 (15, 0)

sections.heading: Provisions relating to hearing and trial in indictable cases.
sections.text:
813.2 Provisions relating to hearing and trial in indictable cases.

[The rules of criminal procedure are published in the compilation “Iowa Court Rules.”] Sat Dec 23 12:34:50 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 813.2 (14, 0)

sections.heading: Trial of simple misdemeanors.
sections.text:
813.3 Trial of simple misdemeanors.

[See §813.2] Sat Dec 23 12:34:50 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 813.3 (16, 0)

sections.heading: Additions to and amendment of rules.
sections.text:
813.4 Additions to and amendment of rules.

The rules of criminal procedure may be amended, provisions deleted, and new rules added by the supreme court, subject to section 602.4202. [C79, 81, §813.4]83 Acts, ch 186, §10134, 10201 Sat Dec 23 12:34:50 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 813.4 (15, 0)
